name: Unstable Magic
description:
You play a Witch with a broken wand and uncontrollable bursts of magic! 

Find a way to survive spooky waves of monsters, from evil bunnies to possessed duck mages, progress to harder levels, and use high concentrated spells!

Last for as long as possible and set a new high score!

Controls:
Arrow - Move
Z/C - Change Spell, Reverse Wand-Rotation
X/V - Super Ability (needs charge)

Code+Sound by DrSmey, Art+Design by Noctiluca
